paragraphs.body: Born in Ferndale, Washington, Norris graduated from Ferndale High School in 1983. In 1988, he married voice actress Mary Elizabeth McGlynn.
paragraphs.text: Born in Ferndale, Washington, Norris graduated from Ferndale High School in 1983. In 1988, he married voice actress Mary Elizabeth McGlynn.

paragraphs.body: Under numerous pseudonyms, Norris has been a voice actor since 1977, beginning in television and moving into film and video games.
paragraphs.text: Under numerous pseudonyms, Norris has been a voice actor since 1977, beginning in television and moving into film and video games.

paragraphs.body: His live acting work began in film with Hobgoblins in 1988 was later featured in an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000 and moved to television with Earth Angel in 1991.
paragraphs.text: His live acting work began in film with Hobgoblins in 1988 was later featured in an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000 and moved to television with Earth Angel in 1991.

paragraphs.body: He provided the voice of J. Jonah Jameson (a role also played by ${link_0}) in the video game Spider-Man (2000) for the PlayStation and Nintendo 64 and the animated series The Spectacular Spider-Man (2008–2009).
paragraphs.text: He provided the voice of J. Jonah Jameson (a role also played by J. K. Simmons) in the video game Spider-Man (2000) for the PlayStation and Nintendo 64 and the animated series The Spectacular Spider-Man (2008–2009).

paragraphs.body: Norris is known for the role as Gordy in forty-four episodes of Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide. Gordy is the school's lazy, wacky janitor who always goads Ned into rash actions while acting as Ned's go-to guy for advice.
paragraphs.text: Norris is known for the role as Gordy in forty-four episodes of Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide. Gordy is the school's lazy, wacky janitor who always goads Ned into rash actions while acting as Ned's go-to guy for advice.

paragraphs.body: He also held the role of Cliff McCormack, a Public Defender and Mars family friend, in seventeen episodes of Veronica Mars. The character of McCormack served as an ally to Keith and Veronica Mars and a client of Mars Investigations.

paragraphs.body: Norris played Buddha Bob in the ${link_0} series Big Time Rush.
paragraphs.text: Norris played Buddha Bob in the Nickelodeon series Big Time Rush.
